RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the 2008 Chevrolet truck: 2008 Chevrolet truck driven by Federico Saldana
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the flatbed trailer: flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Chevrolet truck

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.2008 Chevrolet truck driven by Federico: Vehicle driven by Federico Saldana, searched by officers for drugs, subject of a traffic stop due to unsafe lane changes and near-collisions, with consent given by Federico Saldana for search
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.flatbed trailer towed by the 2008 Chevro: Trailer searched by officers, containing a scissor lift and a piece of heavy machinery
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: Defendant in the case, driver of the 2008 Chevrolet truck, identified himself as a truck driver by trade, has a history of arrests including smuggling of illegal aliens and drugs, served 9 years in federal prison
